amendment.description: An amendment numbered 67 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit any funds made available by this Act from being used establish or modify any national monuments under the Antiquities Act within Colusa County, California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
